text: Please add a light/dark mode toggle in settings (in a new settings setting at the end of the list called "Display")

proposedTasks.title: Add Display section to project settings with theme toggle
proposedTasks.description: Add a new 'Display' section as the last entry in the Settings page. It should contain a theme selector (Light / Dark / System) that mirrors the existing navbar toggle. Changing the theme from either location must immediately update the other and apply the theme globally. Acceptance criteria: (1) A 'Display' section appears at the bottom of the settings list. (2) The section contains a theme picker with Light, Dark, and System options. (3) Selecting a theme persists to localStorage at `opensprint.theme` and applies immediately. (4) The navbar toggle and the settings toggle stay in sync. (5) Default value is System for new users.

taskTitles: Add Display section to project settings with theme toggle
